title: Poison
description: In desperate need of a release from the pressure from her parents to reign at the top of her senior class, Imani Abara finds herself touching herself to a cute stranger online. When she accidentally shows her face on camera one day, things take a turn for the worst and the cute stranger on the other ends recognizes her from Redwood Academy.Little does she know that one of those strangers is one-third of Poison. Corrupt, cruel, and callous, Poison was everything wrong with Redwood Academy. And blackmailing the wealthy good girl is right up their alley.
author: Emilia  Rose
